abstract: The daily deal site is considering an offering valued at close to $12 billion as it prepares for an investor road show next week.
snippet: The daily deal site is considering an offering valued at close to $12 billion as it prepares for an investor road show next week.
lead_paragraph: Groupon, the daily deal site, is considering an offering valued at close to $12 billion as it prepares for an investor road show next week, according to two people with knowledge of the situation.

headline.main: DealBook: Groupon Seeks Valuation at Close to $12 Billion
